settings.title: Super Comfortable!
settings.content: Love these pillows. I've had our Emma pillows for over 8 weeks and we've had the best sleep since. No sagging, nice and firm neck support, and you can remove a layer or two if the height is too much for you. Highly recommended!

settings.title: Great Quality Pillow!
settings.content: The pillow is amazing! It allows you to adjust its height, and one of the layers is much softer than the other, so you can take your pick on which side you prefer to sleep on. It definitely takes the idea of adjustability to a whole new level.

settings.title: My Stiff Neck is Cured!
settings.content: I've had a stiff neck problem with my old microfiber pillow, so I decided to try out the Emma Foam Pillow for a change, and it was definitely worth it. Just a few nights in and my stiff neck is basically gone. That pressure relief feature is the real deal.

settings.tab_content_1:
Our award-winning pillow designed for adjustable head and neck support and great pressure relief. Say goodbye to neck pains!

  • Customizable three-layer foam pillow that comforts and supports any type of sleeper
  • Breathable, hypoallergenic pillow for hot sleepers
  • Easy-to-clean & machine-washable for clean, refreshing sleep
  • OEKO-Tex Standard-100 certified against allergies and skin irritation
settings.tab_content_2:
Our award-winning pillow designed for adjustable head and neck support and great pressure relief. Say goodbye to neck pains!

  • Budget-conscious sleepers who won’t compromise on quality
  • Loved by back, side, and stomach sleepers

settings.title: Your comfort, your way.
settings.content: Any way you want it, that's the way we built it! Whether you want it soft, firm, or anything in between, our foam pillow comes in three mix-and-match layers so you can add what works, remove what doesn't, and have all your needs met perfectly.

settings.title: Chill, no pressure.
settings.content: Stress, sweat, and sore-free mornings! Our breathable UltraDry® pillow cover and AirgoCell® foam layer effectively wick moisture away for a cool, resting environment. Let the pressure melt away with our adaptive visco foam layer, which cradles and soothes all your pressure points.

settings.title: All-around pillow
settings.content: Our pillow retains its support overnight and for years. It is hypoallergenic, vegan, OEKO-TEX Standard 100 tested for harmful substances and has a washable cover. And as always, you can try it for 60 nights with FREE returns!

settings.title: Precise pressure relief
settings.content: Adaptive viscose foam supports your head and neck precisely so that you can sleep completely relaxed.

settings.title: Soft and breathable
settings.content: Heavenly sleeping climate thanks to breathable Airgocell® foam. The softest of the three layers.

settings.title: Supportive
settings.content: Viscose foam with a slightly softer feeling to lie on, but still provides great pressure relief for the head, neck and shoulders.

settings.title: Cooling Cover
settings.content: UltraDry technology transports moisture away quickly and ensures a pleasantly cool, dry sleeping environment.

settings.title: What's the best mix of layers for my sleep position?
settings.content:
Side sleepers: Side sleepers need thick pillows to prevent their shoulders from moving up too close to their heads and building pressure; thus, we recommend using all three layers of the Emma Foam Pillow. Hot, side sleepers can select the Airgocell foam as their topmost layer and side sleepers who like a softer feel can use the soft HRX foam. Meanwhile, those needing extra head & neck support are encouraged to use the visco-elastic memory foam.

Back sleepers: Sleepers who rest on their back require less support than a side sleeper, but more than a stomach sleeper, so we recommend using two of the Emma Foam Pillow layers. The visco-elastic foam layer is best for back sleepers who need a little more support, while the HRX foam layer is suitable for those who prefer a softer sink. Back sleepers who sleep hot can cool off and get refreshing sleep by using the Airgocell foam layer.

Stomach sleepers: Stomach sleepers are most comfortable sleeping with a low-loft pillow, so we recommend using only one layer of the Emma Foam Pillow. Depending on your preferences, you can use the Airgocell layer for maximum breathability, the HRX foam layer for a silky, soft feel, or the visco-elastic foam layer for optimal head and neck support.

settings.title: Do I need to regularly fluff my Emma Foam Pillow?
settings.content: The Emma Foam Pillow was engineered using only the best, high-quality and durable materials, which enable it retain shape and functionality with no need for fluffing night after night. It won't hurt to fluff your pillow every now and then though!

settings.title: How do I clean this product?
settings.content: Cleaning the Emma Foam Pillow is easy and hassle-free! Just place the removable cover into a machine and wash with mild detergent at a low-medium temperature (max: 100°F). To dry, a low-intensity, tumble setting is recommended. In case of spills and dirt though, handwashing the inner layers will not cause damage and these will retain its qualities once dry.

settings.title: Can I return my Emma Foam Pillow if I don't like it?
settings.content: Yes, you can! Enjoy 60-nights risk free with your Emma Pillow, and if you feel it isn't right for you, simply send an email to support@emma-sleep.com to get a full refund and our team will handle the rest at zero cost to you.

settings.title: Shipping, Warranty, & Returns
settings.content:
Free Delivery

We work with UPS & FedEx to ship your Emma products straight from our warehouse to your front door.

Free Returns

Enjoy a 60-nights free trial on your Emma Foam Pillow. We typically require an adjustment period of at least 3 weeks as our researchers confirm that it takes around that long to get suited to your Emma product. Of course, we've made returning of any unsuitable items super easy. Just contact our customer service and we'll take care of the rest.

3-Year Warranty

Enjoy a 3-Year Limited Pillow Warranty for each Emma Foam Pillow purchase.

If you would like to contact us, please feel free to email our support team at support@emma-sleep.com or call them at +1-855-580-3662.

settings.title: Materials
settings.content:
- Pressure-relieving Visco-Elastic Foam

- Soft & Supportive HRX Visco Foam

- Ultra-breathable Airgocell® Gel Foam

- Cooling UltraDry® Cover (Removable and washable; made from 98% polyester, 2% elastane)
